about_the_game:
About This Game

A forgotten dungeon, hidden beneath the modern world. A portal that shouldn’t exist. A challenge that refuses to be conquered.

Beneath the foundation of an unassuming home lies a doorway to an ancient, ever-shifting labyrinth. No records mention it. No maps can chart it. Yet, something inside calls to those daring enough to enter. Armed with only your wits, weapons, and the will to survive, you must plunge into the depths of this procedurally generated dungeon, where danger lurks around every turn.

Each descent brings new threats: relentless enemies, hidden traps, and towering bosses that guard long-buried secrets. As you battle through the dungeon’s twisting corridors, you’ll uncover powerful artifacts and piece together the mystery of a realm lost to time. But be warned—death is only the beginning. The dungeon shifts and reshapes itself after every failure, demanding adaptation, strategy, and relentless determination.

Key Features

  • Ever-Changing Dungeon – Every descent is unique, thanks to procedurally generated layouts, enemies, and loot.

  • Fast-Paced Action Combat – Dodge, strike, and counter enemies in intense real-time battles that reward skill and strategy.

  • Roguelike Progression – Each attempt brings new opportunities, whether it's unlocking permanent upgrades, discovering rare items, or mastering new playstyles.

  • Unravel the Mystery – What lies at the heart of this forgotten dungeon? Who built it, and why was it sealed away? The answers await those who survive.

  • Challenge Towering Bosses – Face monstrous foes, each with unique attack patterns, weaknesses, and lore.

  • A Descent Like No Other – The deeper you go, the greater the challenge. Can you make it to the top… by going down?

The portal is open. The dungeon is waiting. Will you conquer it, or will it consume you?

content_descriptors.notes: Descent to the Top features souls like combat against skeleton enemies and giants. While the focus is on action-packed combat and exploration, the game does not include explicit sexual content, non-consensual scenes, or depictions of drug/alcohol abuse or self-harm.

short_description: Experience a fantastical adventure on PC, developed for players with a drive to overcome the challenges of the Dungeon. Test your skills in engaging combat. Defeat enemies and solve jump and run riddles to get loot and enhance your characters abilities.
